game.name: Country Bumpkin Yutaka
game.shortDescription: Yutaka is returning from a month in the countryside at her grandmother's. She's excited to meet her friends and her sister again, but destiny has bigger plans for her...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Yutaka is returning from a month in the countryside at her grandmother's. She's excited to meet her friends and her sister again, but destiny has bigger plans for her...

reviewHighlights.text: A hentai game centered around a cheerful Yutaka tasked with solving all the problems her hometown has to offer with the help of her cute sister along...
